name: Verify Filesystem Terminal UI Structure
description: Validates that the filesystem terminal displays the correct three-section layout with Power, Temp, and Disk sections.
testObjective: Ensure filesystem UI is properly structured and displays correct information.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Open the middle terminal using [E] or [LMB]

steps.expected: Left section shows 'Temp' directory with temporary files

steps.action: Check for Authentication.kp4 file in Temp
steps.expected: Authentication.kp4 file is present and highlighted
Right section displays dark green background for Disk area

postconditions: Terminal UI displays all three sections correctly
